response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your needs and endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I understand it might seem quite an investment. However, considering its worth to you, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This represents a significant savings compared to its market value of $15,000, making it an attractive opportunity for you. I trust this offer will be appealing, allowing us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.", "product_price": 12000}
